about_the_game:
Draft unique towers, strategically place them for maximum energy, lure monsters into traps, and make wise decisions during events in this innovative tower
defense game!

Drafting


Welcome to a tower defense game like no other! In this exciting adventure, you won't settle for preset towers. You have the power to draft your own towers, each with distinct abilities and attributes. Customize your arsenal to suit your preferred playstyle and adapt to the ever-changing challenges that lie ahead.

Placing


But your mastery doesn't end with just picking towers. Strategic placement is key! Carefully assess the terrain and map layout to position your towers where they can harness the most energy from their surroundings. The higher the energy, the more powerful your towers become, boosting your chances of fending off hordes of incoming monsters.

Luring


Amp up the excitement as you ingeniously lure the relentless waves of monsters into cunningly crafted traps. Devise intricate pathways that lead the unsuspecting invaders into your deadly ambushes. The satisfaction of watching your traps in action as they devastate the enemy is truly unparalleled!

Play again!


The game's environment is ever-evolving, offering a roguelike experience with procedurally generated maps. Each playthrough presents fresh challenges, ensuring no two games are alike. Adapt, strategize, and push your tactical skills to the limit as you strive to become the ultimate tower defense champion!
